title: Is there gonna be a Dj Sona icon?
body: Like the other ultimate skins, will there be a Dj Sona icon?(as it is an ultimate.)

replies.body:
WHAT DOES DJ SONA COME WITH?
Like other ultimate skins, she comes with 3 icons that provide unique summoner profile banners when equipped.

Both Pulsefire Ezreal and SG Udyr had Icons so i don't see why DJ Sona shouldn't.
Would be interesting to see how they'll fit those 3 Splash Arts in the form of Profile Banners though.
